summary: Build a clone-style website modeled after darshan.ac.in with updated branding (name), contact details, address, and a fresh theme.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Original logo/wordmark in a modern academic style, transparent background (campus-wordmark.dim_512x160.png)
- Wide hero/banner illustration in the new theme, abstract campus/education motif (hero-banner.dim_1600x600.png)
- Simple monochrome icon set (4 icons) matching the theme (theme-icons-sprite.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a clone-style marketing website modeled on the overall structure and information architecture of https://darshan.ac.in, but with fully replaced branding so it is clearly a different site (new institution name, logo/wordmark, and consistent site title across header, footer, and metadata).

Replace all contact details and address content across the site with the new contact details and new address, and centralize these values in a single frontend configuration object so they can be updated in one place without hunting through multiple components.

Apply a fresh, coherent visual theme that is different from darshan.ac.in, including a distinct color palette (avoid blue/purple), typography, button styling, and section layout rhythm; enforce this theme consistently across all pages and components.

Implement the primary pages/sections commonly expected from the darshan.ac.in-style college site (e.g., Home, About, Academics/Departments, Admissions, Placements, News/Events, Contact) with responsive layouts for mobile, tablet, and desktop, using English for all user-facing text.

Add a lightweight content strategy so the site can be populated without backend work: create structured frontend data files for repeated content (e.g., departments list, highlights, stats, events) and render sections from that data rather than hardcoding repeated markup.
Add generated, original static assets (logo/wordmark and a hero/banner illustration) and use them in the header and homepage hero section via the frontend public assets pipeline.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a clone-style website based on darshan.ac.in with changed name/branding, contact details, address, and theme.
